items.sentence: I just want some souvenirs to remember this place by.
I just want to see if Tom plans to come to our party.
I knew it was going to hurt Tom, but I did it anyway.
From here, it\'s about three kilometers to the coast.
I wish you could\'ve met Tom when you were in Boston.
I\'d like you to translate this document into French.
Tom missed the opportunity to go to Boston with Mary.
Tom needed some money, so I offered to give him some.
Tom never forgets to call his mother on her birthday.
A person like Tom probably knows how to speak French.
